thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-APG SGA FY EBIT down At CHF 61.3 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-APG SGA FY EBIT down At CHF 61.3 Mln
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - APG SGA SA:
* FY GROUP-WIDE SALES REVENUES FELL BY 4.7% TO CHF 300.7 MILLION
* FY EBITDA CHF 74.8 MLN, DOWN 26.2 PCT * FY EBIT CHF 61.3 MLN, DOWN 31.0 PCT * FY SLIGHT FALL OF 3.5% IN NET INCOME TO CHF 50.7 MILLION
* PROPOSES TO THE GENERAL MEETING THAT AN ORDINARY DIVIDEND OF CHF 12 AND A SPECIAL DIVIDEND OF CHF 12 BE PAID FOR THE FINANCIAL YEAR 2017; THIS CORRESPONDS TO A TOTAL PAYMENT OF CHF 24 (GROSS) PER SHARE
Source text - bit.ly/2GPCbVu
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
